mapper.select: SELECT CO_CD , DL_CD , DL_CD_NM , SORT_ODR , TXT_VAL1 , TXT_VAL2 , TXT_VAL3 , NUM_VAL4 , NUM_VAL5 , NUM_VAL6 , USE_YN , REMARK FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = #{value} ORDER BY SORT_ODR ASC

SELECT CO_CD , DL_CD , DL_CD_NM , DL_CD_ENM , SORT_ODR , TXT_VAL1 , TXT_VAL2 , TXT_VAL3 , NUM_VAL4 , NUM_VAL5 , NUM_VAL6 , USE_YN , REMARK , CREATED_AT , CREATED_BY , UPDATED_AT , UPDATED_BY FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND DL_CD = #{dlCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT CO_CD , DL_CD , DL_CD_NM , DL_CD_ENM , SORT_ODR , TXT_VAL1 , TXT_VAL2 , TXT_VAL3 , NUM_VAL4 , NUM_VAL5 , NUM_VAL6 , USE_YN , REMARK , CREATED_AT , CREATED_BY , UPDATED_AT , UPDATED_BY FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' AND TXT_VAL1 = 'RD'
SELECT * FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'DVC_KIND' AND TXT_VAL1 = 'RD' AND DL_CD = #{value}
SELECT TXT_VAL2 FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'UPDOWN_FLAG' AND DL_CD = #{value}
SELECT TXT_VAL1 FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'EFFECT_TYPE' AND DL_CD_NM = #{value}
SELECT DL_CD_NM FROM SM_DL_CD_INFO WHERE CO_CD = 'EFFECT_TYPE' AND TXT_VAL1 = #{value}
